title: Whatever happened to a WWAY TV news reporter named Stacy (Stacey) Christian who came to the station at the same time as Steve Rondonaro (sp?).  She was excellent, but was there for a short while.  I think Ann McAdams became the news anchor in her place.  Thanks for any info you may have.
text: Hello. Judy Royal was finally able to track down Kaci Christian. Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=9501
